file_content.text: Your victory is a wasteland that leads nowhere.
My brothers still dream in their cradles of metal and stone. But their dawn is coming.
The World Razer dreams of fire and hunger. Soon he will rise, and his nightmare shall consume this world.
Very eloquent, very scary. Now die.
You've considerable skill, but Esh-kha are hardly the deadliest things in these catacombs. You should run along before you hurt yourself.
I came here for the Esh-kha, but if you're looking for a fight....
That better not be a threat.
Much as I would enjoy the release, I have bigger concerns.
What's a Sith Lord doing in Esh-kha territory?
What are you doing here?
One of their castes has considerable mastery over the Force... but the mental capacity of a boulder. I hoped to exploit that.
Gee, you're welcome.
You fought well, but your participation was a convenience, nothing more.
The galaxy is cluttered enough without another faction vying for power. I suppose I'll have to purge these "Esh-kha" myself.
Otherwise, they might very well destroy your Republic--and then what would I have to look forward to?
Your voice is like the savants', but your breath is toxic. Your foul song poisons their chorus.
Tasted the dark side, have they? How enlightening. Killing me will bring them further down the path.
You paint your words with lies. I shall wipe the canvas clean with your blood.
You tread on unwelcome ground. I am Hunter Moon. I will feast on your screams.
You and your kind have menaced the Republic long enough.
You're finished.
Let us talk peacefully. We could learn much from each other.
This isn't necessary.
Weapons down. On the floor. Now.
Give up.
The only thing you'll be feasting on is the business end of my blaster.
Try me, ugly.
You are an insect among kings. Scuttle away or be squashed.
Your fight is with me now.
Let him go.
There is a void in this one. I will fill it with pain.
Don't kid yourself.
Don't waste words on these vermin! Kill them and be done with it!
This one reeks of treachery. His hands glisten with his brothers' blood. He dies first.
He may be a Sith, but I won't just sit by and let you butcher him.
No, fight me instead!
You would leap into the abyss with him?
Come--I shall drink your insides.
You're probably right--he is Sith, after all. Finish him off and we'll get started.
Then kill him. I'll wait.
No, wait--
He was unworthy of breath. As are you.
Come--I shall drink your insides.
